column5: Hi guys , yup I haven't been on for a while to post anything. But I think it's due:) I haven't fished in 8 weeks, it's truely killing me like you wouldn't believe. In lieu of it, I have been fishing  She is gorgeous, wonderful, enlightening, smart, and she loves to fish:) probably a better fisherperson than I. I want to thank all with what's going on:) you guys are the best:)from the bottom of my heart thank you kindly guys and gals:) no need for names, you know who you are:) I found my fishing queen:) Ps do not forget the 2011/2012 ice fishing funniest photo contest. I will post it in due time, have fun and Play safe. A few items have been donated, and I will supply a few as well. If anyone would like to donate an item or two that would be appreciated. I will make a formal post and update daily. Have fun and play safe out there. No need for a guy in a tootoo to fall in:) Cheers and good fishing to all
Glad to hear that things are looking brighter for you.
You sound happy. That's what's important. Don't worry about the online community.
Welcome again Vin. You sounds very positive. I'm looking forward to the ice fishing-funny contest as well
Vin!!!! Ma MAN !!! Nudge nudge...wink wink
Glad things are working out for you  So when is your Fishing Queen going to sign up for OFC?
Way to go Vince! Glad to see your back...Lets get out on the ice as soon as its safe bud.
Being a better fisherperson than you isn't saying much....  :whistling:  Good to hear!
hey bud - good to see you back on your feet again Being a better fisherperson than you isn't saying much....  Good to hear!
Hey Vince good to hear things are going better. Hopefully you get out for some fishing soon.
hey Bud glad to hear things are going well. let me know when you got time to show me how to ice fish again. I will take you out on LPB once again
Welcome back Vince!!  Haven't been on much myself lately...basement, busy, etc. Get out on the water soon
Thanks guys:thumbsup_anim:  Yes sir e bob, shes a keeper alright.
congratz vince, glad to hear things are going well   we'll have to get out on the ice a few times this winter   hopefully it'll be more productive than the first time we met
